folder: De Witt [Dewitt] Clinton Park., Manhattan, NY
text:
De Witt Clinton Park: The stand located in the center thereof, as viewed eastward across the farm garden and from the former line of Twelfth Avenue. Subsequent to 1930, the westerly portion was included in the present Twelfth Avenue, of which the easterly border line would be in the immediate foreground.

December 1905.

George L. Balgue
title: Manhattan: De Witt [Dewitt] Clinton Park.
